abstract: mls best xi : mls cup-bound toronto fc features prominently on team .
article: three members of mls cup-bound toronto fc were featured on the 2017 version of mls best xi , which was announced thursday night . atlanta united -- which enjoyed a successful inaugural season -- and sporting kansas city also featured multiple players on the team . the mls best xi features sporting kc 's tim melia at goalkeeper ; toronto fc 's justin morrow , sporting kc 's ike opara and the vancouver whitecaps ' kendall watson as defenders ; atlanta united 's miguel almiron , toronto fc 's victor vazquez and the portland timbers ' diego valeri in the midfield ; and toronto fc 's sebastian giovinco , atlanta united 's josef martinez , the chicago fire 's nemanja nikolic and new york city fc 's david villa as forwards .

giovinco and villa were also named to the mls best xi last season , while watson and valeri are also repeat honorees . nikolic , villa , valeri and martinez were the league 's top four goal-scorers . almiron was named the league 's newcomer of the year , as he and teammate anchored atlanta united 's remarkable run toward a playoff berth , the first for an mls expansion team since the seattle sounders in 2009 . more : sounders drub dynamo , set up mls cup rematch . more : altidore 's goal puts toronto fc back in mls cup .

more : phoenix rising to ` enhance ' bid for mls expansion . while it makes sense that toronto fc figures prominently on the mls best xi , the defending mls cup champion seattle sounders were not represented . seattle dominated the houston dynamo in the western conference final to join toronto fc for an mls cup rematch . tfc has already won the canadian championship and supporters ' shield , and will go for a historic treble next saturday in mls cup , which it will host . no mls team has ever won the mls cup , the u. s. open cup or canadian championship , and supporters ' shield in the same season .
photos : best of the 2017 mls season .
